name: Doremon
bio: I'm a CAT and ROBOT, not a RACOON !!

name: Nobi Nobita
bio: Chilling through life with gadgets I don’t know how to use.

bio: Net worth higher than Nobita's test scores.

bio: Concerts held daily. Escaping is not an option.

bio: Please don’t teleport into my room. Thanks.

name: Doremi
bio: Warning: magic may cause unexpected explosions.
